content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'synapse-course-cosmos-giannis-db'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [synapse-course-cosmos-giannis-db]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'iU9t0ZZyMD3CA7gJ6Yglh4RYNBbJYoFnacgxwNo9py6S0Ta98vG7XkkpgsLuo3IX6waRAOPY3tp7ACDb2ewwfg=='
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=synapse-course-cosmos-giannis-db;Database=nyctaxidb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapse-course-cosmos-giannis-db'
) AS [Heartbeat]
